item.title: By: Ryan
item.dc:creator: Ryan
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://grandmighty.github.io/grandmighty/2015/10/m3-sold/#comment-302454">Eric</a>.
The link in your sig on Zilvia (regamasters thread). I originally knew your Z from 300zxclub and I must've found the old blog through 3ZC or Zilvia.

The link in your sig on Zilvia (regamasters thread). I originally knew your Z from 300zxclub and I must’ve found the old blog through 3ZC or Zilvia.

item.title: By: Eric
item.dc:creator: Eric
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://grandmighty.github.io/grandmighty/2015/10/m3-sold/#comment-301337">Ryan</a>.
Man the Z were some ancient days! That's cool you found your way to my blog again, I know I deleted my old blog with the Montego Blue RX-7. How did you find me again? I'm an Engineer by profession.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Ryan.

Man the Z were some ancient days! That’s cool you found your way to my blog again, I know I deleted my old blog with the Montego Blue RX-7. How did you find me again? I’m an Engineer by profession.

item.title: By: Ryan
item.dc:creator: Ryan
item.description: Also glad to see you're still updating. I remember following this blog when you were building the green/blue rx7 and just stumbled upon it again. Hell, you may have even been posting about your Z, I don't remember. What do you do for a living if you don't mind me asking?
item.content:encoded: Also glad to see you’re still updating. I remember following this blog when you were building the green/blue rx7 and just stumbled upon it again. Hell, you may have even been posting about your Z, I don’t remember. What do you do for a living if you don’t mind me asking?

item.title: By: Eric
item.dc:creator: Eric
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://grandmighty.github.io/grandmighty/2015/10/m3-sold/#comment-279054">Jin</a>.
Hi Jin, that's awesome, thanks for continuing to check in! See you around one day, feel free to always hit me up.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Jin.

Hi Jin, that’s awesome, thanks for continuing to check in! See you around one day, feel free to always hit me up.

item.title: By: Jin
item.dc:creator: Jin
item.description:
Hi Eric,
Good to see you're still updating this blog, been following this blog since you have your White CBR600RR and Miata. I recently bought an E46 M3 as well, very fun car! Keep up the good work, see you around in the Bay Area!
Jin
item.content:encoded:
Hi Eric,

Good to see you’re still updating this blog, been following this blog since you have your White CBR600RR and Miata. I recently bought an E46 M3 as well, very fun car! Keep up the good work, see you around in the Bay Area!

Jin
